title: harrowing icons?
body: i recieved 2 icons already regarding the harrowing event i got my devil teemo and the minion icon, but i have yet to recieve the icon for gifting someone during the event?

replies.body: *Ironfield* is correct, we're sending them out until the 17th and if you don't have the gifting icon by then, hit us up in a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)
Hi fellow summoner, i believe riot is sending the icons out until November 17th. If you don't have it by then, you can submit a support ticket and they'll help you out.
